name: Solus Block
description:
Solus Block

Created for UDC Jam 25

You wake up alone, without a clue where everyone has gone. Travel further than you ever have as you investigate what happened, fighting your way through hordes of enemies in a fast paced Puzzle Battle System.

Note: Web performance is much worse than windows, so if you have a low framerate I highly suggest the downloadable version. Quality can be changed by using the keys 1, 2, and 3.

Instructions
  • Match three or more blocks of the same element to clear blocks.
    • Clearing fire, water, earth, or lightning blocks will cast spells to deal damage to enemies. 
    • The more blocks you clear at once, the more damage you do. 
    • Clearing orange coin blocks will grant you experience, and each level will increase the damage your spells do. 
    • Blocks that are matched automatically after falling increase your combo count, increasing damage you deal and the experience you gain by 30% each step! Combos of 3 or more will additionally cause your spells to hit all enemies at once! 
    • On hard difficulty, stone blocks serve only to block your path, but can be used to increase your combo count. They do not exist on normal difficulty.
  • Enemy attacks will affect your board
    • Physical/Lightning attacks will lock blocks on the board. These cannot be matched, but can be unlocked by clearing an adjacent block. 
    • Ice attacks will freeze blocks on the board. These cannot be swapped or matched, but will thaw out after some time. 
    • Fire attacks will increase the rate your board scrolls up temporarily. 
  • If the blocks reach the top of the board, you are defeated!
    • Defeat will send you back to the start, but you will keep any experience levels you have gained.
Controls
  • Gameplay
    • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move Cursor
    • Space/E/Left Click - Swap Blocks
    • Shift/Right Click - Increase Scroll Speed
    • Escape/Tab - Pause (Then F To Quit, or Tab/Escape To Unpause)
  • Options
    • M - Mute Music
    • N - Mute Sounds
  • Quality
    • 1 Key - Low Quality
    • 2 Key - Medium Quality (Web Version Default)
    • 3 Key - High Quality (Downloadable Default)
